org.openimaj.vis.general

Class AxisRenderer<Q>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.vis.general.AxisRenderer<Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - The pixel colour representation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisRenderer2D, AxisRenderer3D

    public abstract class AxisRenderer<Q>
extends Object
    A general axis renderer that can be used for rendering an axis into a visualisation.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
